collectible.text:
Congratulations! You've lost Emi's first bet. Enjoy this pair of running shoes that smell like new! They also include a complementary coupon to bitch all you want for one feedback response.
WARNING: These shoes do NOT prevent you from getting embarrassed on the track by Emi.
collectible.unlock: Lose Emi's bet early in the game.
